articles.content: Exercise will always be part of his life, at the very least to keep the muscles around his metal hip strong. I will always maintain a great strength and conditioning programme; going to the gym four … [+2943 chars]

articles.title: Neita and Azu upset favourites to win 100m finals at UK Championships - The Guardian
articles.description: The established pecking order of British sprinting was blown spectacularly off kilter with shocks in both the women’s and men’s 100m finals of the national trials after victories for Daryll Neita and Jeremiah Azu

articles.title: England ‘won’t sit on pink cloud’ after orange walk against Netherlands - The Guardian
articles.description: Manager Sarina Wiegman says Lionesses still have plenty to do after the Netherlands were thrashed 5-1 at Elland Road on Friday in England’s latest Euro 2022 warmup friendly

articles.author: Charlie Walker
articles.title: Erling Haaland at Man City and Darwin Nunez at Liverpool heralds a return of the Big Number Nine - Daily Mail
articles.description: At the peak, there were well over 30 centre forwards of six foot two or taller operating in the top flight in 2011/12, but the number fell steadily to well under half that figure last season.
articles.content:
Huge strikers once roamed the Premier League in packs, terrorising defenders wherever they went, but they have become a much rarer species in the past decade.
